async backend_django.handlers.statistics.checkSession(session)¶

Async check if user in session is logged in or not

Parameters:

session (Dictionary) – coded session dict

Returns:

1 or 0 if session is logged in or not

Return type:

Integer

async backend_django.handlers.statistics.getNumOfLoggedInUsers(activeSessions)¶

Async check how many users are currently logged in

Parameters:

activeSessions (hashtable) – sessions

Returns:

number of logged in users

Return type:

Integer

backend_django.handlers.statistics.getNumberOfUsers(request)¶

Return number of currently logged in users and number of users that have an active session

Parameters:

Returns:

json containing information

Return type:

JSONResponse

Returns:

Response with f you
